1230940.name: Ant Detective
1230940.description:
Once again Kowalski is hot on the trail...of something. You take on the role of the titular Ant Detective in this prequel to learn Kowalski's true backstory...or maybe this game is a sequel where he didn't really die and just got a stomach cramp. We're not sure yet. Either way if you wishlist it we will make sure mother provides another wacky (and much longer!) adventure for Kowalski to ass about in.

Ant Detective is a third person detective noir game with a comedy twist - you're an ant, as is everyone else. Figure out who did the crime, and hope you can make them to do the time. If not you can always fall back to shooting them.

Features

  • Branching crime investigation: collect ant-clues, interview witness-ants, anty-thing a real detective would do!
  • Hyper-realistic gunplay: your gun fires bullets when you pull the trigger.
  • Satirical fully voice acted story; can two guys voice fifty ants? We'll find out.
1230940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
